title: Chelsea to make Gordon bid
text:
Chelsea set to bid for Celtic goalkeeper Craig Gordon By Sky Sports News HQ Last Updated: 26/01/17 11:20am Celtic goalkeeper Craig Gordon is attracting interest from Chelsea Chelsea are preparing to launch a bid for Celtic goalkeeper Craig Gordon, Sky Sports News HQ understands. 
The Scotland international is one of three goalkeepers Chelsea are considering as a replacement for Bournemouth target Asmir Begovic, according to Sky sources. 
Gordon has less than six months to run on his contract with the Scottish Premiership champions, but Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers has insisted the 34-year-old remains firmly part of his plans. Gordon has been a first-team regular under Brendan Rodgers 
Following Wednesday's 1-0 win over St Johnstone, Rodgers said: "I heard something before the game and I'm not surprised. 
"There's lots of speculation about many of our players. It is credit to them that they're performing so well that these great clubs are interested in them. But Craig's very much a part of what I'm doing here. He has really consolidated his game and he sees how we want to play.
